title: Catalepsy demonstration / Non-verbal hypnosis
description:
This video is from the non-verbal hypnosis masterclass by Dr. Marco Paret. He demonstrates the hypnotic state of Catalepsy, in which the body stays rigid like a statue and takes on any position without the subject's force. The subject in the video is a student of dr. Paret that entered in the deep hypnotic experience and after waking up she felt transformed in a positive direction. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
